title: Not getting tokens towards rank 6/7 possibly
body:
Recently I've been having issues with my computer that has caused my league client to crash after the end game screen and not load up the stats, I will then have to re-open league completely. I believe this has stopped me from getting tokens towards rank 7, however I cant be sure because I never saw which rank I got. I thought something was suspicious after my 8/1/6 game on Syndra however I couldn't be sure. However last game I was 21/3/17 and I didn't get a token. Thoughts?

(Summoner name: Keys - OCE)

EDIT: the game was ranked on summoners rift as well so I should be able to get tokens.

replies.body:
Hey there,

When you say you crash _after_ the end game screen, at what point during the play cycle are you referring to?

We had won the game, the victory animation had completed, then I clicked continue, the game closed and then the screen with the stats never opened. I didn't actually say it crashed however after that happened when I tried to open league it said an unknown error had occurred.

Hey there,

Have you attempted running a [client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)?

Also as far as I'm aware, having your post-game lobby not appear shouldn't make you ineligible to receive hextech rewards, as these are applied serverside should you meet the requirements for them (Mastery tokens, etc). Perhaps you're just not achieving an S or higher rank?

No I haven't tried that yet, I actually wasn't aware that was there, thank you. Also yes that's what I thought I may just have not been eligible for the rank, although I have had friends receive S and greater for less kills, more deaths and less CS so I assumed it was a glitch, thanks for the help hopefully the client repair fixes the issue.
